text: The Joneses Have Amateur Theatricals is a 1909 American silent comedy movie directed by D. W. GriffithThe Jones Have Amateur TheatricalsBernard A. Drew. Motion Picture Series and Sequels: A Reference Guide and stars John R. Cumpson, Florence Lawrence, and Linda Arvidson. ==Actors== *John R. Cumpson - Mr. Jones *Florence Lawrence - Mrs. Jones *Linda Arvidson - The Maid *Clara T. Bracy *George Gebhardt - Theatre Man *Anita Hendrie - Theatre Woman *Marion Leonard - Mrs. Trouble *David Miles - Theatre Man *Herbert Prior - Theatre Man *Mack Sennett - Theatre Man *Harry Solter *Dorothy West - Theatre Man ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1909 movies Category:1900s comedy movies Category:American silent movies Category:American comedy movies Category:Movies directed by D. W. Griffith
title: The Joneses Have Amateur Theatricals
